languages.text: Вы можете ускорить действия врагов — нажмите [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] во время хода противника, и бой пройдет быстрее.
To {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} up enemies' actions, press [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.
languages.original_text: Вы можете ускорить действия врагов — нажмите [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] во время хода противника, и бой пройдет быстрее.

traits.locale_text: To speed up enemies' actions, press [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their turn to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.
To speed up enemies' actions, press [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their turn to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.
To speed up enemies' actions, press [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their turn to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.
To {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} up enemies' actions, press [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.

languages.text: 在敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，您可以按下[{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}]来加快敌人的行动，让战斗以更快的速度进行。{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}{/g}
languages.original_text: To {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} up enemies' actions, press [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.

traits.locale_text: 在敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，您可以按下[{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}]来加快敌人的行动，让战斗以更快的速度进行。{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}{/g}

languages.text: 敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に[{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}]を押すと、敵のアクションが{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}スピード{/g}アップし高速で戦闘を進めることができる。
languages.original_text: To {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} up enemies' actions, press [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.

traits.locale_text: 敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に[{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}]を押すと、敵のアクションが{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}スピード{/g}アップし高速で戦闘を進めることができる。

languages.text: Para {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}acelerar{/g} las acciones de los enemigos, pulsa [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] durante su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} para que el combate vaya más rápido.
languages.original_text: To {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} up enemies' actions, press [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.

traits.locale_text: Para {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}acelerar{/g} las acciones de los enemigos, pulsa [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] durante su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} para que el combate vaya más rápido.

languages.text: Um die Aktionen der Feinde zu {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}beschleunigen{/g} und das Gefecht auf diese Weise zu verkürzen, drückst du [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] während ihres {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g}.
languages.original_text: To {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} up enemies' actions, press [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.

traits.locale_text: Um die Aktionen der Feinde zu {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}beschleunigen{/g} und das Gefecht auf diese Weise zu verkürzen, drückst du [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] während ihres {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g}.

languages.text: Pour {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}accélérer{/g} les actions des ennemis, appuyez sur [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] pendant leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} afin de permettre un déroulement plus rapide du combat.
languages.original_text: To {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} up enemies' actions, press [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.

traits.locale_text: Pour {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}accélérer{/g} les actions des ennemis, appuyez sur [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] pendant leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} afin de permettre un déroulement plus rapide du combat.
